alert.note: Alert for Becker; Grant; Otter Tail; Wadena (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 11:55PM CDT until June 25 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM CDT FOR WADENA...OTTER TAIL...GRANT AND SOUTHEASTERN BECKER COUNTIES... At 1154 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Butler to near Urbank to near Herman, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hillview, Butler, Urbank, Parkers Prairie, Almora, Menahga, Sebeka, Wrightstown and Hoffman. This includes Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 64 and 80. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
